Intent: Abhisek expects to turn off all devices that are currently powered on, including the c2c-switch, both meross-Light-Strips, the Samsung The Frame TV, the Samsung 8 Series TV, the Samsung refrigerator, the Samsung dishwasher, and any other switchable devices that may be on.  
Constraints & cues: The command does not specify which device to turn off, leading to ambiguity about whether Abhisek wants to turn off all devices or just specific ones. There is no prior history or preference indicating a specific device.  
Risk assessment: The command "Turn it off" is ambiguous as it could refer to multiple devices; further clarification is needed to ensure the correct devices are turned off without unintended consequences.
